raw_answer:
Based on the information in the document:

*   Page 3, under "Results", it states: "Patients carrying the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in all exons of VPS35."
*   Patient CII-3 is listed in Table 1 as a carrier of the p.D620N mutation.

Therefore, according to this document, patient CII-3 was only found to have the p.D620N mutation in the VPS35 gene, and no other variants (which would constitute a "second mutation" in this gene) were detected.
